content.raw:
I think a default value of 1 is probably good. We should have a major release since it will change results.

This explanation should be in `Model generation` in the docs, nearer to the other `--prior-strength` option. Make a new subsection right before `Task selection`.

We should also change the name of `--prior-strength` since there are multiple priors, but keep `--prior-strength` as a deprecated synonym.
content.html:
I think a default value of 1 is probably good. We should have a major release since it will change results.

This explanation should be in Model generation in the docs, nearer to the other --prior-strength option. Make a new subsection right before Task selection.

We should also change the name of --prior-strength since there are multiple priors, but keep --prior-strength as a deprecated synonym.
